summary: Tested Invoice Line Items display fixes and CSV Import/Export features. Backend: 12/12 tests passed. Frontend: All features verified working.
seed_data_creation: Used existing invoice and client data for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: All features verified: Invoice line items display correctly with Qty=1, Weight with 2 decimals. CSV Import/Export working with correct headers. Parcel import preview modal shows client matching.

invoice_line_items_display.qty_column: PASS - Shows 1 for all items (not weight)
invoice_line_items_display.weight_column: PASS - Shows weight with 2 decimals (e.g., 17.50 kg)
invoice_line_items_display.dimensions_column: PASS - Shows '-' for legacy data without dimensions
invoice_line_items_display.amount_column: PASS - Adequate width, shows amounts like R 1 116,00

client_csv_export.download_button: PASS - Export Clients CSV button in Settings -> Data tab

client_csv_import.button: PASS - Import Clients CSV button in Settings -> Data tab triggers file picker
client_csv_import.preview_modal: PASS - Shows preview with client count before import

parcel_csv_import.button: PASS - Import Parcels CSV button in Settings -> Data tab
parcel_csv_import.initial_modal: PASS - Shows 'Import Parcels from CSV' dialog
parcel_csv_import.expected_columns: PASS - Lists 'Sent By, Primary Recipient, Secondary Recipient, Description, L, W, H, KG, QTY'
parcel_csv_import.qty_creates_multiple: PASS - QTY > 1 creates multiple parcels with sequence

settings_data_tab.client_data_section: PASS - Shows Import Clients and Export Clients cards
settings_data_tab.parcel_data_section: PASS - Shows Import Parcels from CSV and Export All Data cards
settings_data_tab.danger_zone: PASS - Shows Reset All Data with confirmation dialog

api_endpoints.GET /api/export/clients: PASS - 200, returns CSV with correct headers
api_endpoints.POST /api/import/clients: PASS - 200, imports clients and returns summary
api_endpoints.POST /api/import/parcels: PASS - 200, imports parcels with client auto-matching
api_endpoints.GET /api/settings/currencies: PASS - 200, returns currencies with exchange rates
